/usr/bin/c++      CMakeFiles/tamagotchi.dir/sources/button.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tamagotchi.dir/sources/draw.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tamagotchi.dir/sources/showBMP.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tamagotchi.dir/sources/tamagotchi.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tamagotchi.dir/sources/timeleft.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tamagotchi.dir/sources/connexion.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tamagotchi.dir/sources/sql.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tamagotchi.dir/sources/textinput.cpp.o  -o tamagotchi -rdynamic -L/usr/local/lib/mysql -L/usr/local/lib -lSDL_ttf -lSDL_image -lGL -lmysqlclient -lmysqlpp -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib/mysql:/usr/local/lib
